tool_description: Get all cities present in a country
name: Get All Cities
title: Get All Cities

api_list.name: Get Cities
api_list.description: This endpoint will fetch an object with "cities" as key, and a STRING value of all cities (using CSV) after a request is made. **(URL/{country})**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-all-cities1.p.rapidapi.com/United Arab Emirates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-all-cities1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://get-all-cities1.p.rapidapi.com/{country}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-all-cities1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
